entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -23.6°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
